meanings.definition: The time or period of time that is to come.
meanings.sent1: My future looks bright with many opportunities ahead.
meanings.sent2: We must plan for the future to ensure success.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if my future self will still enjoy the same hobbies.
meanings.sent4: The future is a blank canvas waiting for us to paint our dreams.
meanings.sent5: The future holds endless possibilities just waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: Something that will happen or exist in time to come.
meanings.sent1: The future of technology is unpredictable but exciting.
meanings.sent2: Predicting the future is a challenging task for many.
meanings.sent3: I hope my future includes lots of ice cream and laughter.
meanings.sent4: The future is like a puzzle with missing pieces waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: In the future, we may have flying cars and robot assistants to help us.
